title: Person i use2date won't stay off my old phone he stole frm meN its got my Personal info i need stop
content:
My ex stole my old phone and has been hacking onto my new phone getting info off of it and pretending that he's me. And goes on dating apps and porn sites and pretends to be me on the messenger apps so ge can make it look bad on me.. and all sorts of sick things that I don't prefer to have on my account.  I want/need for this to stop. I've already had to get a person who can help w slandering my name by this guy Eric Mclamb . Please help me please
B4 this goes way to far like usually dude
